about_the_game:
Proper hydration has a positive effect on our overall health. It helps maintain fluid balance in our body, regulates body temperature and improves cognitive function, it is essential to stay properly hydrated to maintain overall health and well-being.

With a friendly and intuitive interface the WaterReminder app helps you stay hydrated by providing reminders and easy water usage tracking so you can stay healthy and enjoy the benefits of optimal hydration.

Key features of WaterReminder :

  • Easy monitoring of water consumption : You can record the amount of water consumed with one click. The app allows you to track your daily progress to help you reach your hydration goals.

  • Water Needs Calculator : WaterReminder integrates a smart calculator that estimates your individual water needs based on various factors such as your weight, height and gender. It gives you personalized recommendations to maintain optimal hydration.

  • History and Statistics : See your water usage history easily with clear and concise statistics. You can track your daily, weekly, monthly and yearly intake, allowing you to understand your hydration and track your progress over time.

  • Track other beverages : In addition to water, WaterReminder also allows you to track other beverages such as coffee, tea, soft drinks and more. It gives an overview of the fluid consumed during the day.

  • Custom Reminders : WaterReminder sends you regular notifications to remind you to drink water. You can set these reminders to your preferences, helping you create a healthy routine and stay hydrated throughout the day.

  • Steam offline : WaterReminder can function independently of Steam, you do not need an active connection to Steam to use the application. However, for license validation purposes, a connection to the Steam application is required at least once every two weeks.
